unLP3h2hHLIN4IOP5P3pAg.text: Always fresh fish, with a crunchy batter, chips and friendly staff. Really good and makes me wonder what can make a fish & chips better than this.

IJFmagfMQoj0HfUTZK5DWg.text: This place is so good.  Honestly the best fish and chips on the planet (as least in my experience.)  The fish is fresh, the batter is light and crispy.   Go out of your way to for lunch or dinner here if you must.  It is fantastic.

5XYQP-BNTodjKaRmoOd7UQ.text: Friendly staff with that kind of family feel. Chips are grand and they dint charge extra for sauce . Proper !

nouBBCaX0-TtmpYuUFg7bQ.text: THE best fish and chip shop in town. Forget that place up in Kingsland Waste that gets all the plaudits, the guys at The Golden know exactly what they're doing although the lovely boss says that he's been in the business for 30 years and is still learning. Anywhere that can take an order for half a dozen teas at totally different strengths and gets them all spot on gets my thumbs up - and my mates' too. Everything is freshly and perfectly fried, the portions are huge, and the service fantastically friendly. They'll do batter thick or thin to your liking, or grill your fish instead. Whatever you prefer the guys will do their best to accommodate, nothing is too much trouble. The home-made salad is amazing, full of garlic, chilli and herbs and is the only thing to have with the scampi. Room to eat inside or out, plus it's licensed so if you don't want the lovely tea there's wine or beer to be had instead. The only trouble is if you're off to the GDA dance cabaret afterwards you're going to be too full to join in. But it's worth every mouthful.

0gHjCboT_YfzLhge9BIoIg.text: I've spent holiday in London, and have had fish and chips at multiple restaurants. This is by FAR the best. Friendly staff, great prices, quick service, and most importantly amazing food!

pvc9QR5AzEVnMfU7XrxVeg.text: This place is hands down the best fish and chips I have ever experienced!!  The place has a very cozy, warm, and friendly atmosphere and the staff and owner are awesome!!!  Go with his suggestions and you will not be disappointed!  It was worth the trip from Dallas to find this gem!!  Bring your appetite because the portions are ample!

X1WtZ5T_YmCzhXHHxhXAKw.text: So traveling on business and only my second trip to London ever.   A few of us were in Greenwich area and being in London, wanted to get some fish and chips.   Several choices in the area so we pulled up trip advisor and Yelp and this seemed to be the place with the best reviews. We arrived and started second guessing ourselves as this was a small joint with seating for 12.  Mostly built for carryout and we wanted to do a sit down dinner somewhere a little nicer, but since we were there, we decided to try it out.  What a good decision. The owner (Chris) was behind the counter and heard us talking so engaged us and couldn't have been nicer.   He recommended that we try the Haddock and Cod, and why argue with the owner. Both were delicious but the Cod was some of the best fried fish I have ever had.   Chris even came over to talk to us.  He had been doing this for 40 years and you can tell he has a passion for it.   He talked about how excited he got every morning when the fresh fish arrived and the satisfaction he gets hearing people compliment his food.   I have had fish and chips that cost 3 times what this did that wasn't half as good. Tender fish in a batter that was cooked just right All I will say is if you are in the area and looking for fish and chips, this is the place to go.  Make sure you strike up a conversation. With Chris too as he is as genuine as they get.  I suggest you order the large as

fLx31n2Wg8ZFDSbDYsi_nA.text: The fish was as fresh and as piping hot as it could be.  The portions were substantial, the price point is excellent and the workers are friendly and helpful.  It was very busy when I stopped in at the recommendation of a friend, but I didn't wait very long as they are extremely efficient.  I am in London about once a month and I plan on stopping for my fish & chips fix here every time.  Thanks for a great meal!

UwIUAv4bYbn_aoZJWveteQ.text: We went to this shop based on trip advisor. It was wonderful! There weren't any open tables for our party of six but they set up a table in the shade across the street! The food was really good. And we were checked on several times throughout the meal. Good food and great service!

nakkOELqXzpLd3PR4kRH0w.text: This place is the real deal.  A little out of the way, but the portions are great, service is amazing and the staff is clearly there to please. I'd go here anytime we were near London if you want bona fide Fish and Chips. Also can't beat the price points for London

aO_ODJfNlUlZfejTpR7RvA.text: Really great fish and chips. Huge portions. Great service. Nice outdoor seating. Open late.

dmxGeepS5cRatEi9nDj2uQ.text: 5 stars because the fish n chips were great and the staff was great. Smiles all around and great hospitality. Very attentive service. Rated best fish n chips in London and I agree. They offer different fish to choose from. Good selection of beer as well.

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

RZegofPIoh6CDxeERGqOLA.text: We came from USA to visit our cousins and they brought us to this place for fish and chips which london should be known for. This place has the best fish n chips ever! And their service is spectacular! Super nice and polite...the haddock and chips is delicious. It's very meaty, not too bready. And for 7 pounds for a huge piece, fresh and salad...omg....u need to try it

EHCw7Gx7XA-zRFOf23C0Tw.text: This place doesn't need another 5* review but I'm giving it one anyway. Portions are generous, I'd have been hard pressed to make it through a large order of cod and chips. The owners clearly care about the food they serve. We are in, place was spotless and the staff were very attentive. Two of us ate our fill for less than £25. Definitely going back while I'm here.

Ey9DTw_ZrsEgBKOWd-vDLQ.text: Super friendly neighborhood shop. Excellent fish and chips. Deserving of 5 stars. Great prices and excellent food. I'm not a huge fan of mushy peas (room temperature mushed up peas) but had to try them. They're ok.

TWqztGjc38eufVxUKgOkOg.text: I've been here 3 times now. The service is great and the fish and chips are excellent and consistent! The fish is not heavily battered. You may even say the batter levitates like a very light, golden halo around it. You don't feel heavy after eating it. They provide a very sizable portion of chips. Again, they taste light and are not heavily drenched in oil.They are very generous with their sauces. Whole jars of tartar sauce and full bottles of ketchup at your disposal.

tzNkMC6Hy1cCAMjkvBK0FA.text: Ive eaten fish'n'chips from all corners of England and these are up in the top marks category. Succulent fresh fried fish,  proper real chips and a welcome that gets a 10 out of ten. This is what fish'n'chips should taste like and amazing value. If you ever only eat fish'n'chips once in your life let it be at the golden chippy.Paul nottinghill gate London

M6ks-7ItHLz9psl3mBuajw.text: My husband and I were visiting in London and desperately wanted to have some good fish and chips. Luckily, we found this little gem right next to our AirBnB. We arrived and the owner greeted us. He made a fresh plate of haddock and cod for us and kept us company while the food was being made. Let me tell you.....this is the best fish and chips you will ever have. The fish is so crispy, flavorful, and leaves you completely satisfied. This place is great and you will be glad you made a trip to Greenwich for it!

wXOBWMvzfrKe81MLNvMDDw.text: The Golden Chippy is fantastic, it was recommended by the our Airbnb host and I couldn't have been happier.The chips were crispy but soft on the inside, just right. The fish tasted fresh and was fried to perfection, with a nice and thin crispy layer of batter. The service was also amazing, from the time we walked in we received prompt and informed service. Also, we tried the Abbot lager and were very happy, with it :)

RO_SfHplrr0RrFLNCWzmsA.text: Love this chippy! Super tasty, fresh and crispy fish - couldn't be anymore perfect. The service is also so friendly and welcoming. They've got a patio out front and seats inside to dine in as well. Definitely goes above and beyond the local fry shop.

LhIMa80Ht6a5I9C30cfT6A.text: This was the best fish and chips we had during our visit to the London area. That is saying a lot because we had fish and chips several times at highly rated places. The prices are low, and the staff is friendly. We sat at a nice outside table and could not help but notice the large number of people coming for take-away. This is a very popular place, deservedly so. I recommend it highly.

IIVzbNbqLlpL4Sv7iMoCfg.text: Only had 2 days in London and traveled out to Greenwich to try The Golden Chippy. Well worth it! Friendliest chef and staff and the food was delicious!

nWqCBstdObBG3WPSEQ-75Q.text: The Golden Chippy was right in front of the hotel I was staying at in Greenwich. I knew my hotel location was handy for something other than the obvious. I didn't try the fish and chips (is that blasphemy?) because I already had a good ol' portion of it in the Dover ferry I took to get to London from France. Instead I ordered a quarter pounder like burger that tasted delicious. Don't worry Golden Chippy, I'll be back and I want that legendary fish and chips with mushy peas that you are most famous for.

Dig4UG_MYkrgbXc4f23O6Q.text: My husband and I live around the corner from the chippy. It's the best fish and chips we've had. We order from here at least once every two weeks. The haddock is especially good--we always get the haddock. The owner is very friendly! Definitely recommend it!

dCZ9bwN59nR3oF-6yrcRUw.text: Came with the family to spend the day in Greenwich.  Really was in the mood for fish and chips.  Decided on coming here based on all the Yelpers reviews​, 36/37 5-stars, with one 4-star coming from someone who didn't even order fish and chips.Had really high hopes, but the place is a bit of a walk from the pier, far enough for the kiddies to start whining.  When we finally did get here, I was surprised at how much of a hole in the wall it looked and started doubting my decision to come here.At the counter, we were greeted by the proprietor, father and son, both seemed to take great pride and joy in interacting with their customers, granted we were the only ones there.  They explained the different choices between the types of fish, and in the end suggested what to get and made sure we didn't over-order and stuff ourselves silly.  Most other places probably would've encouraged us to order more.When it came to the food, well did it hit the spot!  The fish was savory and humongous!  We had hard time putting away two large ones between two adults and two kids.  In the end, what I really enjoyed about the Golden Chippy is the customer service.  We really felt that the owners cared about our experience there.  It also taught me to never judge a book by its cover.  This place is definitely well worth the walk away from the typical tourist traps if you're in Greenwich for the day.

ck-Zdltxk0FUFD-IYJs0Lg.text: Read reviews about this place on a Gluten free blog, excited to go when we arrived today! They did not disappoint - excellent Gluten free fish and chips! We had the GF cod and our guests had the regular fish and chips, all were crispy and fresh. The owner "Chris" went out of the way to welcome us, hugs , hand shakes and checking back to make sure we were happy. What a wonderful dining experience! Also the nice herb salad they make fresh, is a lovely touch of brightness!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

K969I07-A4q5N_s0-u7Ikg.text: The food is great. But I had to come leave a five star review for the service. I forgot the server's name. I think it's Cam - the half Turkish man working there. He was so friendly and kind. What a pleasant experience.

_EHIydphQ5oEBzP8hHDQFg.text: Awesome fish and chips.   Best we found in London and Dublin.  Owners were great and took wonderful care of us.

y-_amhWFQEJ2T-1cqa51NQ.text: Excellent Fish and chips! The staff is so nice and friendly. The locals show up for pick up . Lots of regulars , there was a sweet elderly on a buggy picking up for her and her husband. Great place for family!

b_CYR9aojysIIJWvuf1zyQ.text: First off the service was impeccable. Extremely friendly staff and the owner came out to greet everyone that was dining in. The food was some of the best fish and chips I've had. For a no frills chipper it stands up to the expensive big name restaurants around London. The price is excellent and the portions or huge. I had the haddock and it was lovely. They continued to offer us more chips as we were eating. We drove 20 minutes away from our 5 star hotel restaurant to eat here and had better food and service was easily more superior. Highly recommend this establishment.

NCR_dgbU6JEbJy9im-rXkg.text: The staff are friendly. The food was worth the price. It is a place you have to go "on your to do list" the food is like a heavenly bite of memories and makes you feel right at home.

4cmE32cmvFXGe-eAHWXqJg.text: The best meal in London is in Greenwich. We felt like family as soon as we walked in. Mouthwatering fish (the haddock beats the cod!), mountains of chips (traditional vinegar of course!) just right salty salad. Don't bypass the curry sauce or onion rings--both are awesome. Daughter gave two thumbs up to the fried chicken, too. Absolutely perfect!

tuqzcGG0L2wFkphnRz67fw.text: Such an amazing place! I had halibut grilled fish and it was sooo yum  Every dish we ordered was cooked to perfection. Customer service at its best. Highly recommend this place

0OhHWjvXOB_LN7eJDndfPQ.text: Loved the fish and chips, and the owner and staff are very friendly.  Authentic!  Very simple decor.  We really enjoyed it.

-hJ3hxQU4T9CnrSCyA0_6A.text: Perfect fish and chips, lovely outside seating area, impeccable service. Slightly off the beaten path, but well worth the extra few minutes' walk. Looking for excellent fish and chips? Go here.Need I say more?

1DJ-rADSFzFkALOi9MRZEA.text: I had never tried fish n chips before so since it was my first week in London, ever, I decided to do some research and find a place that I thought I would enjoy! This was a cute little spot that was welcoming from when I was on the outside of the restaurant to the end of my meal! The service and recommendations were excellent!!! Everyone was so friendly and the haddock fish n chips were AMAZING!! I can see why this place was rated a 5, and I will be visiting again before I head back to the states! Thank y'all so much! :)

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

wo19OK9XbkXAgnkDVOr8Iw.text: Small place with amazing food and even better service!  Prices were really reasonable.  It was roughly £10 for huge plate of fish and chips and salad.  Really friendly staff and owner.   We stayed at a nearby hotel and found this little gem thanks to Yelp.  We had the cod, which was great but I thought the fried chicken was even better than the fish.  The Mediterranean salad that came with it was so good, we ordered a side plate of just the salad.   Really friendly owner came by to chat with us a bit which was really nice.   Highly recommend!

c7yXDFvjoV6Ys9t4Ipa2zw.text: Very good and extremely reasonable.  We had cod (fish and chip type) and fried chicken and corn and coleslaw.   All was delicious and not sure if it came with it but we were served a small mixed salad on the plate.  That salad was really good. It had a delightful mix of greens and mint leaves with a vinagret  sauce Very unique and tasty.  Weather was nice and we sat outside. Would definitely recommend.

gDZ2f3aCQeOr2LaMtYarPg.text: Best fish and chips ever! Missed good fish and chips for some time as moved to USA from Australia over four years ago. Found this place around corner from hotel. I will definitely go again before I leave in a few days. Sooooooooo good!!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

OUd76gfQMXjJsxl0MXpxcA.text: The only problem with this place is that it's ruined fish and chips for me anywhere else in the world!!! Damn them!! So fresh, inexpensive, fried to perfection, variety of fish, super friendly. This is pub food at it's absolute best.

saNnflwfJeQNteLnQbHAWg.text: Visited today after a long flight from the States. The customer service was fantastic and the food was delicious and served in abundance. Loved it!!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

I2ACHSz0ymeLKVy2J2Qr_A.text: Fantastic staff, awesome food. Best haddock I've ever had, try the thing that they do in England, two vinegars on two piles of fries with lots and lots of salt! The staff was awesome. Make sure you shake the oragina. They were very kind to us Americans.

wlM8gCzJXZjUV2pBaAu-4g.text: Went here based upon the five star reviews. First time in England and we wanted some good fish and chips. We were not disappointed. The staff was very friendly, helpful, and attentive. The adults had the cod. Huge portion even just ordering the regular size and the prices were great too. Nothing was overly greasy, the salad was fresh and the dressing was light and refreshing. One kid had chicken and the other a spring roll and onion rings. Everyone enjoyed themselves. Not one bad thing could be said about the whole experience. I would highly recommend this place to others.

e4F-mr7W-DUwxCKYUkQEEA.text: Came all the way from hawaii to Greenwich in search of Fish & Chip!  Ok, half truth...the first part. One of the best fish and chips we ever had!  Great neighborhood eatery.  Friendly people.  Had fun talking to the charismatic owner.

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Yummy!
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Love the neighborhood too!:)

_CV2dgkF0TM_lbFXagdXgw.text: Ate here twice over a 4 day period. Outstanding fish  and chips. Had cod twice and wife had halibut. The large with a side salad and mushy peas was a great meal for us both plus teenage daughter and son. Super reasonable.Was in London for 16 days, wish I had found this place sooner.  Fast foodish looking inside, nice patio sit down service outside. Reasonable wine and beer cost, super friendly staff. Owner a happy fun character.Just a great experience. Highly recommended. Have never done a yelp review prior, just felt compelled to due to how good

sPazKu9THUjwE22n4U0qLw.text: When I saw the reviews for this Fish and Chips spot I knew I had to try it.   Unfortunately I was not blown away.  We arrived and decided to eat outside.  The gentlemen helping us handed us menus and told us to take a seat outside.  We placed our orders Haddock with chips.  After about 10 minutes or so, our food was delivered.  Sadly the fish was not cooked fresh but they grabbed fish out of the warmer.  I believe if you are eating in and paying more to eat in, they should make your food fresh.  The only fresh item was the chips. As someone else stated you do get a jar of tartar sauce with your fish which is nice, but a homemade sauce would probably tasted better. The batter was fine but nothing special.  The fish also did not taste fresh.  It had a very overly fishy taste to it.  The only part I actually enjoyed was the fries.Just so anyone who does not like skin on their fish, THERE IS SKIN ON THE FISH!!!!!   Do not order the Haddock if you don't like skin.  As someone who doesn't care for the skin it was very off putting.  I can't speak to the other types of fish having skin but I know the Haddock does. Don't get me wrong, I am not knocking off stars for the skin as some places make it that way and I'm sure many people enjoy it.  I just was not impressed by the food and not making the fish fresh along with the fries. Service was fine and the gentlemen who wanted on us was very nice.  No complaints regarding service.

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Skin on the haddock

kO6Sij8bcR_nzGBviREK8w.text: Fabulous food and service, Great experience! Highly recommended!

fU-BXqQd0xAQlTUnWLrJMA.text: This was the last meal we had in London and we loved it! We came around 11 ish and sat outside since we had a lot of luggage. The people there were super friendly and helpful on accommodating our big group. My boyfriend and I got the cod and haddock fish and chip. It was AMAZING! Haddock had a lot more flavor so I'd definitely recommend that. The chips were perfectly fried as well. The large was really big so I think a regular would've been fine especially if you're sharing some sides. Highly recommend trying this place if you're looking for fish and chip!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

nYvYfNEbcyU0z0Yr7TFyHw.text: Truly believe this could be the best fish and chips I've ever had! The staff was so friendly, especially the chef/owner! Highly recommend! -your friends from Kentucky

UAcTQpaWDu4gW5iM8P4uPA.text: Fabulous service and food and ambience, great value, great menu , located a little away from downtown Greenwich and the park but well worth the 5-10 mins walk to get there

w5K9EWv7WTuc8pxKNkQwuA.text: Amazing Fish and Chips. So flaky and fresh. Amazing service and kind people. Great experience!

wk9IjBIRBZgNuYtzeZuALQ.text: My friends and I walked to the Golden Chippy from where we were staying in New Cross. From a distance you see their sign. They are right on a corner. They have tables outside and two tables inside. We wanted to sit outside but all the tables were full. Luckily we grabbed a table inside. We all ordered fish and chips, I ordered the haddock and my friends got the cod. Everything is cooked fresh and you can taste it! Crispy, flakey, moist and perfect fish. The chips were think cut and tasty. The salad is refreshing and they put Thai basil in it which gives it a unique flavor. They bring each table a jar of tartar sauce, ketchup and mayo. There's vinegar and salt and pepper at the table. Great experience. The owner is very charming and friendly! They also have chicken nuggets, meat pies, fried chicken, jacked potatoes, and sausages. Great array of comfort food. This place isn't fancy, just solid GOOD food. Definitely go!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Large haddock and chips. Delicious. Crispy. Moist and fresh tasty fish. Only about 10!

vKnxAJvYBQzxea0Tj-7vxA.text: Highly recommended !!!  Large oration and very friendly owner and staff. Local friendly

WJDQtIum-pm4I2VSX1VSPA.text: This place lives up to the hype. Traveled across town on my birthday  just to have lunch here. We ordered the haddock, my sister got the cod and portions are large enough to share. For about 10 pounds, you get excellent service, a dish full of large fish  chips and salad  They serve tap water  on request and give complimentary watermelon  at the end of your meal. Highly recommend. The restroom is in the back and was clean.

A_2YJGzNyI5ySeP9t2jsSg.text: The Golden Chippy has by far the best and most reviews for fish and chips on yelp or trip advisor. We went on a 45 minute journey to get there from West London and I will have to say it did not disappoint. Chris, the owner, was so pleasant and friendly. He made the experience so much fun!! Come hungry the portions are pretty big!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

JXDBBKOgMG7zRmYd-F6grA.text: One of THE best fish and chips I've tasted in London so far! Portion size is great and they give you a whole jar of tartare sauce along with your chippy.I highly recommend the haddock fish and chips and also their scampi

i7pEkjHg0SLKyy9Zt4NzXw.text: After our day trip to Greenwich to see the requisite tourist attractions, we had worked up quite an appetite! Walking uphill to see the prime meridian will do that to you! Well, The Golden Chippy hit the spot perfectly. The Yelp reviews don't lie; they know how to do their fish! They have both takeaway (which we opted for ) and dine in options. Prices are great - £6.50 for a large cod, 7 for a large haddock, 3 for large fries, and £1 each for coleslaw and sweet corn, as well as mushy peas and other sides. The star wasn't the fish - the haddock was the best fish and chips I've ever had. Batter was not too crispy or soggy, and fish was flaky but moist. Cod was solid too, as were the chips. Coleslaw with sweet corn was great and vinegary.  I've had better mushy peas, these were on the plain side. Service was pleasant and prompt, our order took 8-10 minutes to cook. It's worth the 15 minute walk from the Cutty Sark, and even closer if you take the train to Greenwich station. Take some to go and eat a picnic by the pier waiting for your boat to come in!

aueQUAsXYEtRxt6I7KGuvw.text: This was my first fish and chip experience in London and I highly recommend Golden Chippy! We found this restaurant on yelp and it had 60 - 5 star reviews, which is unheard of! You can choose from a number of different "line-caught" fish and either have it fried or grilled. I had the fried haddock and chips with mushy green peas and a cheese and onion pasty. My friend had grilled halibut and chips with fried garlic mushrooms and my other friend had fried halibut and chips with corn and a Jamaican patty pasty. At the end of the night, the owner and chef gave us amazing baklava bites! Check out my photos!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Cheese and Onion Pasty
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Homemade Baklava made by chef's wife
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

KPuT9auCgH2vLynX_uJbWg.text: We ate here whilst visiting London last week. Coming from the north of England where good fish and chips are on every street corner, I must say these fish and chips are as good as any I have tasted. Good atmosphere and seems to be very popular with Americans. Would absolutely eat here again.

u6_ZaLWf9HqLcf3mkmqIlw.text: Almost 40 all 5 star reviews and all deserved. We were in London for three days and ate here twice. We found it from a list of the best restaurants for a classic English meal and i'm glad we did.. The price points are fair and the food is truly delicious. We tried two different kinds of fish and minced pies, loaded potatoes, mashy P's, and it was all great. It's a tiny location but they are fast and clean. Their tartar sauce was amazing. The only thing I wouldn't order next time would be the rolls. Other than that, even the side salad's were amazing and flavorful. I can't wait to come back next time in London.

0mNUeikj5YQdHqDRqifGfA.text: Jet lagged Americans coming through. Ok ok. We were not that obnoxious. Hubs and I are from the states, Los Angeles to be precise. We were staying at the Hilton a block away and turned to Yelp for a local spot to eat. We had just arrived in London and were starving and exhausted. Luckily the Golden Chippy was only a block away. Hubs and I had no idea how London food scenes work. Do we order at the counter, sit down and wait to be served? I'm sure we confused the heck out of the workers. Being as tired as I was, my hubs told me to take a seat outside and he would order for us. After that hump was gone over, everything worked out smoothly. Our breaded cod and chips were on point.  I was so happy that everything tasted fresh and delicious. Server brought out tartare sauce, ketchup and mayo. Yum!Being an American, I could not understand a word any of the workers/servers told us. At that point, a large Spanish family arrived and the server switched to Spanish. And I understood everything. Next time solamente voy a hablar en español porque haci nos vamos a entender mejor. TLDR: great local spot for fish and chips.

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Job well done! Hubs and I satisfied.
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Americans and their ketchup!
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. The fixins

Wi72zvBgeA8vT6NBVYjOzA.text: Best Fish n Chips in Greenwich. The fish are fresh and portion just perfect.  Will definitely come back next time we are back in the U.K.

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Best Fish n Chips in Greenwich. I wish we have the same in my home town in the US.

TID8tibukMWFQWXr2kjI4w.text: Fish and chips don't get any better than this. Simply spectacular food with a matching service. Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom

j2aXotRSjYTgv8zukO7Viw.text: Came here on a recommendation from our hotel. The food is delicious, a large plate was more than I could finish and I tried. Staff is very friendly and go out of their way to make you feel comfortable. We came here 12 days ago when we started a coach tour and when we got back tonight we had to have it again. Well done Golden Chippy.

photos.caption: Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Fish and chips plus a battered sausage
Photo of The Golden Chippy - London, United Kingdom. Fried chicken and chips
